summary: Complete your collection of 30 trading cards and view them in game
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49053-1-1388114013.jpg[/img][youtube]tkAptOIMFug[/youtube][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49053-1-1387913856.png[/img][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49053-3-1387913857.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/296113/?][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49053-1-1387910760.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48987/?][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49053-1-1387911212.png[/img][/url][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49053-2-1387913856.png[/img]
While I created the mesh for the cards (mesh, uv wrapping, collision, inventory rotation) and placed them in game (and into leveled lists), the cards themselves were written and designed entirely by Reimar67. Iâ€™m very grateful to Reimar67 for being so generous and letting me use his well designed, beautiful and witty cards! I also constructed this mod based on downloading the Print Your Pack PDF file by Reimar67 and MapleVolt, so thank you to MapleVolt too!
[url=http://www.facebook.com/IceburgModding][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/15827-1-1349192119.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49053-2-1388114017.png[/img]
And thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1937550/?tb=about&pUp=1]MapleVolt[/url] for making this great Tamriel Geographic Issue!
[/center]
author: Iceburg and Reimar67
